website_summaries.verdict: Good price point, especially for a bunk ladder that has a 66-inch length.
pros: Nice quality for a bunk ladder that's available in either black or silver colors
Includes rubber coating on each of the four steps to prevent possible slipping
Gives you multiple options for mounting the ladder, providing versatility to meet your needs
cons: Gaps between steps are a little wider that some people may like

customer_reviews.title: Great, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: It fit our need exactly. The bunk in our RV needed a ladder because my 7-year old daughter needed help to get into the top bunk. We secured the ladder vertically to the bunks and replaced the top hooks with rubber feet. This way it also serves a a bit of a bed rail. Great, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Madden

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality / Damaged / Unsafe Bunk Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ladder from the Amazon Warehouse in “Like New condition: item unused and undamaged, box may be damaged...” It arrived missing all hooks and rubber feet, and the legs were bent to the point of rendering the ladder unsafe for use. I understand this damage is likely an Amazon Warehouse oversight, but after seeing / feeling the flimsy nature of this ladder first hand; it’s safe to say it didn’t take much at all to bend / damage this ladder. Regardless of what the manufacturer says, this ladder cannot bear much weight and I would not trust it to support my children (both under 50 lbs). I highly recommend seeking a safer ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Works on Toy Hauler with Happijak on highest setting
customer_reviews.text: We like to have the top bunk on the highest setting so we can more easily use the seats underneath without hitting our heads. We struggled to find a bunk ladder tall enough, but this one works perfectly. We appreciate how light it is, but still sturdy enough for parents to crawl up and say goodnight to the kids!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fully assembled and sturdy!  No instructions for bracket hardware :/
customer_reviews.text: I love that the ladder came fully assembled...that is a definite plus! The shipping box was pretty much destroyed, but the ladder was intact. My biggest complaint is there were NO instructions about where to put the 2 different sets of brackets that came with the ladder. I didn't find it self-explanatory. LOL
customer_reviews.author: dirob57

product_meta.title: Quick Products QP-LA-466B RV Bunk Ladder, 66" - Black
product_meta.description: Nobody wants to struggle around while on vacation, especially when it comes to bedtime. So why struggle getting into that hard-to-enter top bunk in your RV? The RV Bunk Ladder from Quick Products makes it easy to climb in and out of bed without the hassle of a permanently mounted stair or ladder clogging up your valuable floor space. Mount over the edge of the bed frame or into the provided mounting brackets for a secure four-step climb, then simply remove the ladder and store it away when it’s not needed. Rubber foot pads provide a no-slip grip and protect the floor from scratches while soft rubber sleeves on each step deliver a safe, comfortable grip while ascending or descending the ladder.
feature_bullets: Provides easy access to the top bunks in your RV without permanently taking up valuable floor space
Mounts over existing bed frame or into provided mounting brackets
Rubber foot pads and sleeves deliver a safe, comfortable grip
Easy to install, easy to remove
